mapper.insert: insert into customer(name, gender, email, phone) values ( #{name}, #{gender}, #{email}, #{phone} )
mapper.select: select * from customer where name like '%'|| #{search , jdbcType=VARCHAR} ||'%' or email like '%'|| #{search ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ||'%' or phone like '%'|| #{search ,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ||'%' order by name
